t: God*p standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
How*p long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
Defend*p the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
Deliver*p the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.
They*p know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
I*p have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
But*p ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
Arise,*p O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
